mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy and light blue on brown) announcing the Beaverkill Mountain Road Race starting at the Beaverkill Valley Inn on October 10. Poster features a woodcut of hills and valleys.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
